description:
Sheril Kamelot is the Fourth Disciple of the http://anidb.net/ch10022 [Noah Family], representing the "Desire" of Noah and is truly named Desires. He is the adoptive father of http://anidb.net/ch82914 [Road Kamelot] and the elder brother of http://anidb.net/ch84615 [Tyki Mikk].
His power seems to be a form of telekinesis, as he is seen crushing his target`s limbs without touching them, and manipulating the movements of the Science Department team. He is also seen to manipulate objects, as he did with the pipes that bound http://anidb.net/ch81263 [Alma Karma].
Source: Wikipedia, edited.
name: Sheril Kamelot
